title: Book Review: ‘Novelist as a Vocation,’ by Haruki Murakami
description: In a new memoir, “Novelist as a Vocation,” the Japanese writer reflects on his craft and his career.
dc:creator: Charles Finch
media:credit: Nathan Bajar for The New York Times
media:description: Haruki Murakami reflects on his career in a new memoir, “Novelist as a Vocation.”
